EmailTemplate.name: LE-202209-HP-ENT-SEVT-AHIP-CONSUMER-EXPERIENCE-DIGITAL-HEALTH-FORUM.post-event-a
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great seeing you at the recent AHIP Forum!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you! We hope you enjoyed the AHIP 2022 Consumer Experience & Digital Health Forum as much as we did, listening and learning from innovators in the industry who are leading the way toward greater health for all. Thanks also for taking the time to meet with us to discuss a single, integrated, whole-person care solution for your virtual care needs. If you are interested in learning more about Teladoc Health, or if there is anything else we can help you with, feel free to contact us <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/contact/]]> anytime. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
